items.title: Topics
items.content_text:
### List of blogs and websites

*   [Localhost server stack](https://webstack.wikimint.com) - wmWebStack: A lightweight, customizable server package designed for web development. Featuring essential tools like PHP, MySQL, and Apache, wmWebStack empowers developers to create, test, and secure their web projects effortlessly.

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Unspecified / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-ui](https://ngxui.com/docs) - NGXUI from [Omnedia](https://github.com/omnedia) is a collection of standalone components that you can simply install and use in your Angular projects. It primarily features components, blocks, and templates geared towards creating landing pages and user-facing marketing materials.
items.content_html:
Unspecified / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-ui - NGXUI from Omnedia is a collection of standalone components that you can simply install and use in your Angular projects. It primarily features components, blocks, and templates geared towards creating landing pages and user-facing marketing materials.

items.title: Awesome Marketing
items.content_text:
### Content Marketing / Content Management Systems (CMS)

*   [WordPress](https://wordpress.com) - The world’s most popular CMS, offering extensive plugins and themes for customization.
*   [Drupal](https://www.drupal.org) - Open-source CMS known for its robust security and scalability.
*   [Joomla](https://www.joomla.org) - Flexible and easy-to-use CMS, ideal for building websites and online applications.
*   [HubSpot CMS](https://www.hubspot.com/products/cms) - CMS that integrates seamlessly with HubSpot’s CRM and marketing tools.
*   [Squarespace](https://www.squarespace.com) - All-in-one website builder offering beautifully designed templates and an easy-to-use interface.

### Marketing Automation / Customer Journey Mapping

*   \[Creately]\(<https://creately>
items.content_html:
Content Marketing / Content Management Systems (CMS)

  • WordPress - The world’s most popular CMS, offering extensive plugins and themes for customization.
  • Drupal - Open-source CMS known for its robust security and scalability.
  • Joomla - Flexible and easy-to-use CMS, ideal for building websites and online applications.
  • HubSpot CMS - CMS that integrates seamlessly with HubSpot’s CRM and marketing tools.
  • Squarespace - All-in-one website builder offering beautifully designed templates and an easy-to-use interface.

Marketing Automation / Customer Journey Mapping

  • [Creately](https://creately

items.title: Awesome Rust
items.content_text:
### Libraries / Logging

*   [donnie4w/tklog (⭐110)](https://github.com/donnie4w/tklog "donnie4w/tklog") - lightweight and efficient rust structured log library with support for log levels, file segmentation, compressed archiving.
*   [estk/log4rs (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/estk/log4rs) - highly configurable logging framework modeled after Java's Logback and log4j libraries [![CircleCI](https://circleci.com/gh/estk/log4rs.svg?style=shield)](https://app.circleci.com/pipelines/github/estk/log4rs)
items.content_html:
Libraries / Logging

  • donnie4w/tklog (⭐110) - lightweight and efficient rust structured log library with support for log levels, file segmentation, compressed archiving.
  • estk/log4rs (⭐1.1k) - highly configurable logging framework modeled after Java's Logback and log4j libraries

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### AI / Diagnostics

*   [3v0k4/exit.nvim (⭐16)](https://github.com/3v0k4/exit.nvim) - Prompt LLMs (large language models) to write Vim commands.

### Utility / Diagnostics
